page.title: 18Half Term in Bromley
page.content:
I go to Horniman's Museum.I make clay things and straw things and papier mache.I go on Saturdays and half terms. I made a clay dish.First I made a clay slab.I went round the Museum and I looked for four patterns.I went back. Then I cut them out.Then I printed onto clay.Then Carol glazed it and put it in the kiln.Girl aged 7.
My Dad was doing our drive which was our front garden.First we lifted up the grass and mud and took it to the tip. Then we marked out where we were going to put the drive and we dug a trench. We filled it with bricks and tiles.Then we put sand on the bricks.Then we put concrete.Then we pushed a machine called a Whacker over them.Boy aged 7.
